resources.string: Register a Keyword and a set of Actions from below list. Whenever a message with registered Keyword is received from any of the parents mobile number, all the actions registered with that keyword will be executed
Lock - Screen will be Locked when a message \'Lock\' is received
Kidmode - Selected settings in Sms Actions will be done when a message \'Kidmode\' is received

string.name: smsactionsheader
string.i: Note: Sms messages will be considered only from Registered Mobile Numbers. Click here to Add/Update
